Class CcddDbCommandHandler

java.lang.Object
CCDD.CcddDbCommandHandler
public class CcddDbCommandHandler extends Object
CFS Command and Data Dictionary database command handler class

  • Method Details

    • setEventLog

      protected void setEventLog()
      Create a reference to the session event log. This can't be done initially since the event log hasn't been created when this class is instantiated

    • setConnection

      protected void setConnection(Connection connection)
      Set the database connection
      Parameters:
      connection - Database connection

    • setStatement

      protected void setStatement(Statement statement)
      Set the connection statement
      Parameters:
      statement - Connection statement

    • setNetworkAndQueryTimeouts

      protected void setNetworkAndQueryTimeouts(Component component)
      Set the time limit for the database to respond and for a query to complete execution
      Parameters:
      component - GUI component over which to center any error dialog

    • executeDbQuery

      protected ResultSet executeDbQuery(StringBuilder command, Component component) throws SQLException
      Execute a database query command and log the command to the session log
      Parameters:
      command - SQL query command to execute
      component - GUI component over which to center any error dialog
      Returns:
      Command results; returns null if no connection exists to the server
      Throws:
      SQLException - If no connection exists to the server

    • executeDbUpdate

      protected int executeDbUpdate(StringBuilder command, Component component) throws SQLException
      Execute a database update command and log the command to the session log
      Parameters:
      command - SQL update command to execute
      component - GUI component over which to center any error dialog
      Returns:
      Command result row count; returns null if no connection exists to the server
      Throws:
      SQLException - If no connection exists to the server

    • executeDbCommand

      protected boolean executeDbCommand(StringBuilder command, Component component) throws SQLException
      Execute a database command and log the command to the session log
      Parameters:
      command - SQL update command to execute
      component - GUI component over which to center any error dialog
      Returns:
      True if the first result is a ResultSet object, or false if it is an update count or there are no results
      Throws:
      SQLException - If no connection exists to the server

    • executeDbStatement

      private Object executeDbStatement(CcddConstants.DbCommandType commandType, StringBuilder command, Component component) throws SQLException
      Execute a database update statement and log the command to the session log
      Parameters:
      commandType - Command type (DbCommandType)
      command - SQL update command to execute
      component - GUI component over which to center any error dialog
      Returns:
      Command result (content is dependent on the command type); returns null if no connection exists to the server
      Throws:
      SQLException - If no connection exists to the server

    • executePreparedStatement

      public PreparedStatement executePreparedStatement(StringBuilder command, Component component) throws SQLException
      Execute a command that is in the format of a PreparedStatement and return the result
      Parameters:
      command - Command string
      component - Component over which to position the error dialog
      Returns:
      Command in the format of a PreparedStatement
      Throws:
      SQLException - Command fails

    • rollbackToSavePoint

      protected void rollbackToSavePoint(Component component) throws SQLException
      Revert any changes to the database back to the save point, if it exists
      Parameters:
      component - GUI component over which to center any error dialog
      Throws:
      SQLException - If an error occurs rolling back to the save point

    • createSavePoint

      protected void createSavePoint(Component component) throws SQLException
      Create the save point if it doesn't exist
      Parameters:
      component - GUI component over which to center any error dialog
      Throws:
      SQLException - If an error occurs creating the save point

    • releaseSavePoint

      protected void releaseSavePoint(Component component)
      Release the save point if it exists
      Parameters:
      component - GUI component over which to center any error dialog

    • getList

      protected String[] getList(CcddConstants.DatabaseListCommand listType, String[][] listOption, Component parent)
      Retrieve a list from the server or database. The command strings are set up to explicitly sort the list alphabetically, without regard to capitalization
      Parameters:
      listType - Type of list to be retrieved
      listOption - Array containing replacement text within a command; null if none is needed
      parent - GUI component over which to center any error dialog
      Returns:
      String array containing the requested list items in alphabetical order; an empty array if no items exist

    • get2DList

      protected String[][] get2DList(CcddConstants.DatabaseListCommand listType, String typeName, Component parent)
      Retrieve a 2D list from the server or database. The command strings are set up to explicitly sort the list alphabetically, without regard to capitalization
      Parameters:
      listType - Type of list to be retrieved
      typeName - Table type name
      parent - GUI component over which to center any error dialog
      Returns:
      String array containing the requested list items in alphabetical order; an empty array if no items exist
